# Support

## Need Help?

### 1. Documentation

Check the `docs/` directory and the `README.md` first.

### 2. GitHub Discussions

For general questions, "how do I...", or ideas, please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Recipe-Web-App/user-management-service/discussions).

### 3. GitHub Issues

If you have found a verified bug, please open a
[GitHub Issue](https://github.com/Recipe-Web-App/user-management-service/issues/new/choose) using the appropriate template.

### 4. Security

For security issues, see our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md).

## Common Questions

**Q: How do I run the service locally?**
A: Run `make run`.

**Q: How do I update dependencies?**
A: Run `go get -u ./...` followed by `go mod tidy`.

## Response Times

We aim to respond to support requests within:

- **Critical Bugs**: 24 hours
- **General Questions**: 2-3 business days
- **Feature Requests**: As time permits
